scripts.setup: git config submodule.recurse true && git submodule update && node ./hosting/scripts/setup.js && yarn && yarn build && yarn dev
scripts.build:dev: lerna run --stream prebuild && yarn nx run-many --target=build --output-style=dynamic --watch --preserveWatchOutput
scripts.check:types: yarn build && yarn check:dependencies && lerna run --concurrency 2 check:types
scripts.restore: yarn run clean && yarn && yarn run build
scripts.nuke: yarn run nuke:packages && yarn run nuke:docker
scripts.clean: lerna clean -y && echo Cleaning top level node modules ðŸ§¹ && rm -rf ./node_modules && echo Done! ðŸš€
scripts.kill-all: yarn run kill-builder && yarn run kill-server && yarn kill-accountportal
scripts.dev: yarn dev:init && yarn run kill-all && lerna run --parallel prebuild && lerna run --stream dev
scripts.dev:noserver: yarn dev:init && yarn run kill-builder && lerna run --stream dev:stack:up && lerna run --stream dev --ignore @budibase/backend-core --ignore @budibase/server --ignore @budibase/worker
scripts.dev:server: yarn dev:init && yarn run kill-server && lerna run --stream dev --scope @budibase/worker --scope @budibase/server
scripts.dev:built: yarn dev:init && yarn run kill-all && cd packages/server && yarn dev:stack:up && cd ../../ && lerna run --stream dev:built
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:eslint && yarn run lint:prettier
scripts.lint:fix: yarn run lint:fix:eslint && yarn run lint:fix:prettier
scripts.build:docker:single:multiarch: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 -f hosting/single/Dockerfile -t budibase:latest .
scripts.publish:docker:couch: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 -f hosting/couchdb/Dockerfile -t budibase/couchdb:latest -t budibase/couchdb:v3.3.3 -t budibase/couchdb:v3.3.3-sqs-v2.1.1 --push ./hosting/couchdb
scripts.publish:docker:dependencies: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 -f hosting/dependencies/Dockerfile -t budibase/dependencies:latest -t budibase/dependencies:v3.2.1 --push ./hosting
scripts.mode:self: yarn env:selfhost:enable && yarn env:multi:disable && yarn env:account:disable
scripts.mode:cloud: yarn env:selfhost:disable && yarn env:multi:enable && yarn env:account:disable
scripts.submodules:load: git submodule init && git submodule update && yarn
